properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE ST_CATEGORY = 1
SELECT RNUM, ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY FROM GLIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE ST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND ST_CATEGORY = 1

SELECT RNUM, ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ST_NO, ST_CONTENT, ST_TITLE, ST_PRICE, ST_QUAN, ST_PATH, ST_ONAME, ST_RNAME, ST_CATEGORY FROM STORE WHERE ST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND ST_CATEGORY = 1 ORDER BY ST_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
